name: Sembliance (Samina Trachier)
description:
This game was created for a studio class with fellow designers: Kevin Ray, Maddy Sutton, Colin Hernando, and Adam Goren.

Sembliance is a futuristic 3D platforming simulation where the player must use momentum and flipping polarity to overcome various puzzles.

For this project my Lead role was head UX/UI Designer, in addition Art Director, and Level Designer.

Kevin: https://kevin-ray.itch.io/

Maddy: https://msutton22.itch.io/

Colin: https://github.com/ColinH131

Adam: https://adamax.itch.io/

Fall 2019

Developed in Unity 2019.1.9f1

Windows 10
